scripts.start:all: concurrently "cd packages/api && yarn install && yarn start" "cd packages/vending-machine && yarn install && yarn start"
scripts.test:all: concurrently "cd packages/api && yarn install && yarn test" "cd packages/vending-machine && yarn install && yarn test"
scripts.lint:all: concurrently "cd packages/api && yarn install && yarn lint" "cd packages/vending-machine && yarn install && yarn lint"
